page.title: 09PRESTON'S GUILD HALL
page.content: Building on the Guild Hall began in 1969 and it was opened in 1973. It should have been opened in the Guild Year of 1972, but there was a builders strike. It cost Â£1,500,000 to build. The Guild Hall tries to cater for every section of the community . The complex includes the Grand Hall, Charter Theatre, restaurant, cafe, bars, banqueting hall and shopping arcade. The Grand Hall holds 2,142 people and the Charter Theatre holds 801 people. It is used for plays, shows, parties, pop concerts and games such as indoor bowls, tennis, darts, badminton and netball.
